dict.acceptation: 性的，有性别的；性欲的；生殖的；[生]有性的；

sent.orig: The right to sexual autonomy, sexual integrity, and safety of the sexual body.
sent.trans: 性自主、性完整和性系统的安全权。

sent.orig: They are more vulnerable to sexual abuse, inappropriate sexual behaviour, sexually transmitted diseases and teenage pregnancy.
sent.trans: 他们更容易受到性虐待，不恰当性行为，传播性疾病以及青少年怀孕的伤害。

sent.orig: Objective To survey sexual behaviors and sexual attitudes among women working in recreation places.
sent.trans: 目的了解娱乐服务行业流动妇女的性行为和性观念现状。

sent.orig: There is no doubt that young women's sexual fantasies of all sexual activity an important component.
sent.trans: 毫无疑问，年轻女性的性幻想是所有性活动中的重要组成部分。

sent.orig: Inhibited sexual desire is the as decline in sexual response.
sent.trans: 性欲是抑制相同的性反应下降。
